name: Gold Rush (GetMyIsland)
description:
This game was made during Mini Game Jam 85 in 2 days.

This game is a light-gun shooter similar to "Crazy Chicken". The game takes place during the gold rush in California and you have to get your hands on as much gold as possible in a 60s time limit.

This is the second game I ever made without any tutorials and I'm still learning a lot, that's why a few things might feel a bit clumsy, but it's definitely playable and hopefully fun for you, at least I had fun creating and playing this game.
